About.title: About Me
About.description: Hello! I'm Omer. I love building user-oriented, performant, and aesthetic digital experiences with modern web technologies. I am a person who constantly learns and does not hesitate to try new technologies. Currently, I am mainly in the Next.js and TypeScript ecosystem.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: My main goal is not just to write code, but to solve a problem in the most elegant and efficient way. In the future, I want to take part in the architecture of large-scale systems.

ProjectsCard.noDescription: No description provided for this project, but it's definitely a great job!

Contact.title: LET'S MEET!
Contact.description: You can always write to me for new projects, collaborations, or just to say hello.

problem.title: Problem
problem.content: Difficulty in managing lengthy URLs and high latency issues during the redirection process.

solution.title: Solution
solution.content: Integrated Redis (Upstash) for ultra-fast redirection through caching. Utilized Supabase for persistent data storage and Next.js with TypeScript for a robust, type-safe development environment.

outcome.title: Outcome
outcome.content: Gained deep understanding of serverless performance optimization, edge-side caching strategies, and efficient database schema design.

problem.title: Problem
problem.content: Efficiently managing large product catalogs, ensuring high-performance image delivery, and maintaining smooth shopping cart interactions.

solution.title: Solution
solution.content: Implemented a flexible data model using Prisma and MongoDB. Leveraged Google Cloud Platform for scalable image storage and optimized asset delivery using Next.js performance features.

outcome.title: Outcome
outcome.content: Mastered full-stack development patterns, cloud integration strategies, and complex state management for e-commerce workflows.

problem.title: Problem
problem.content: The need for a high-performance, aesthetic, and multilingual digital showcase to best present my projects and competencies to both global and local audiences.

solution.title: Solution
solution.content: A comprehensive I18n structure was established using next-intl. While an interactive user experience (UX) was created with Framer Motion and Tailwind, project updates were made dynamic through GitHub API integration.

outcome.title: Outcome
outcome.content: A professional platform focused on search engine optimization (SEO), high accessibility, and proving technical depth (App Router, Server Components) was developed.
